items.sentence: The last thing I want to do is cause you any more pain.
I wish Tom would hurry up and do what he said he\'d do.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be jealous.
Tom was born on the same day that his grandfather died.
I don\'t believe Tom really plans to do that this week.
I don\'t believe that Tom could have said such a thing.
I don\'t expect anything out of the ordinary to happen.
I have a few questions. Would it be OK if I asked them?
Please remember to put out the fire before you go home.
Several thousand people became victims of this disease.
Please tell me which bus to take to get to the station.
Put the book back in the same place where you found it.
I can tell you things you won\'t hear from anyone else.
He has the habit of reading the newspaper during meals.
Tom\'s planning something special for Mary\'s birthday.
Tom took off his glasses and put them down on his desk.
Tom took off his tie and started unbuttoning his shirt.
Tom wanted to learn how people in other countries live.
Tom was afraid that the typhoon would damage his house.
Boston is on my list of places that I\'d like to visit.
